peripheral.translation[0].definitions[0]: not as important as other things or people in a particular activity, idea, or situation
a diplomat who had a peripheral role in the negotiations
Her involvement in the case was peripheral.
The romance is peripheral to the main plot of the movie.
peripheral.translation[0].definitions[1]: in the outer area of something, or relating to this area
peripheral.translation[0].definitions[2]: peripheral equipment can be connected to a computer and used with it
peripheral.translation[1].definitions[0]: a piece of equipment that is connected to a computer and used with it, for example a printer
peripheral.translation[2].definitions[0]: an activity, business etc that is not the most important one that a company is involved in
The firm is neglecting profitable core businesses to develop peripheral activities.
peripheral.translation[2].definitions[1]: equipment that is connected to a computer and used with it
The company focused on supplying peripheral products such as printers.
